answers.answer: I get headaches and have had them mist my pregnancy.  Just make sure you are hydrated. It is okay to take Tylenol for the pain if they get too bad.

Uh I would definitely bring this up to your doctor. Headaches became really frequent for me just before my last doctors visit and it was the first thing they asked me. I said yes and they asked me if I saw like sparkles and I did in the shower and my BP was through the roof. They rushed me to the hospital in an ambulance and I had to deliver the next day a month early because I had very dangerous preeclampsia. This may not be what you're experiencing at all but I didn't know what to look for in a situation like that for my first pregnancy.

question: I'm 38 weeks and 3 days pregnant. These past couple of weeks. I get a headache every night. Sometimes it's there all night long. ;/Just wondering if this is normal since I'm a FTM.
title: Anyone else experiencing a lot of headaches???
